title: A Votre Sante
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, International, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Popular westside/Brentwood restaurant with a large selectio of vegetarian and vegan options on its menu, including vegan soups of the day, salads, sandwiches and wraps, tofu and vegetable plates, pizza, and vegan cakes and pies. Nice atmosphere. Parking lot behind restaurant.
